alert.note: Alert for Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 8:25AM CDT until June 29 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in southwestern Iowa... Northeastern Mills County in southwestern Iowa... Southeastern Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... Page County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 825 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shelby to near Shambaugh, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Clarinda, Shambaugh and Braddyville around 830 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
